title: "Property of Kled!" sign ward skin?
body:
It really feels like it would work as a little bit of a character specific ward skin that's in line with the character, plus it would be funny for a Kled user to kill a jungler shouting "DID YOU NOT READ THE SIGN!?" in all chat.

EDIT: Wow, I did not expect this to gain such popularity to get into the best section. Thanks, people!

replies.body: There is nothing I want more than this!    {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
I mean you have the connections don't you Mr. Rioter XD I imagine you can at least tell someone who can pitch it?
Him and Kindlejack still have bad blood over that one Mario Party incident involving the star theft. It's unlikely WAAARGHbobo can help us with this one.
Did you say... blood? (✿ω✿)
Calm down, you dirty Vlad Main ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
If there's one person who could it probably would be the guy who wrote Kled's VO.
YES PLEASE. I won't care if I waste a ward but it would be amazing to put a ward next to a dead body or turret after execution. Feels accomplishing.
I have never known I would ever desire a _ward skin_ to be made so much. Please make it!
Hey WAAARGHBOBO what if you make an ultimate skin. Conquerer kled and the feature of his skin is that he has a personalized ward skin that you can enable disable that says property of kled
how about poro braum skin?
What about making champion-related ward skin for a potential mastery 8 reward?
I'd buy Cled and grind my way to level 8 just for that ward skin.
Yeah, i think he's the next champion i buy. ({{champion:83}}  and  {{champion:9}}  are in heavy competition, just depends if i can hold onto the IP until i can get Kled.)
Well you can get both yorik and fiddle at the same price as kled.
yeah... well now i'm thinking about {{champion:63}}  as well. I could probably do without fiddle (its only for playing him support :))
Who is Cled?

Cled, the kantanckerous klavier

doi
I have never bought a ward skin.  I would buy that ward skin.

Save this idea for when Kled gets his Legendary skin, unles they take my idea of making "Gentleman Kled" a legendary skin (imagine, all kleds line but said like "Well I surely declare you must be an ignoramous to challenge me!" or "What in the blazes are you doing my scaly companion?!" and such)

10/10 idea tho.

"Good heavens! To what territory have we traversed this time?"
-upon entering game

> [{quoted}](name=StarGuardianWeeb,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TKjGXQdN,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2017-05-24T17:56:13.410+0000)
>
> Save this idea for when Kled gets his Legendary skin, unles they take my idea of making "Gentleman Kled" a legendary skin (imagine, all kleds line but said like "Well I surely declare you must be an ignoramous to challenge me!" or "What in the blazes are you doing my scaly companion?!" and such)
> 
> 

I would instabuy that Kled.
I never knew how much I wanted this.
Come forthwith my cowardly companion!

"Mundo wuz here" ward skin.

Also, +1
No, JINX was here PLEASE!
Yes! ~~and it can even stream drawing ekkoxjinx smut~~
~~lemme see some of dat plz~~
~~I don't think I'm allowed to link that via boards~~
~~no you doofus go on my discord or something and post it there~~
~~I don't even know your discord~~
~~I could totes link it, or I could add you and link you there~~
~~add me if u dont want the boards to see your discord~~
~~done ~~
Mundo goes where he pleases! [slurp]

Me playing my main ({{champion:240}}  of course)

1) **When I win a 2v1 or something like that:** /all GET THE F*** OFF MY LAWN
2) **When I feed my laner and then kill them 1v1:** /all YOU THOUGHT KLED WAS DONE? KLED AINT NEVER DONE. 
3) **Upon being fed, and enemy kills team:** /all I SEE YOU ON MY LAND! STEP ON MY LAND AGAIN, YOU'RE DONE!
4) **When I'm against fiora:** F*** me...

As you can see, I am very clearly obsessed with my land.

Can I have this PROPERTY OF KLED ward just so I can stick it in my lane? Whenever the enemy comes back they just see PROPERTY OF KLED

Hell i might include a sightstone in my kled builds JUST SO I CAN ABUSE THIS WARD SKIN. 

In Riot terms: Please make this ward skin so I may better assist my teammates and take some weight off of my support.

I'm actually surprised they didn't make this a ward skin when Kled was released. I imagine a rickety old wooden sign that has "Property of Kled!" crudely written on it. 
It'd be even funnier if Kled himself said lines related to killing Champions near his wards or when his wards are destroyed.

> [{quoted}](name=Icarax88,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TKjGXQdN,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2017-05-25T03:50:46.505+0000)
>
> I'm actually surprised they didn't make this a ward skin when Kled was released. I imagine a rickety old wooden sign that has "Property of Kled!" crudely written on it. 
> It'd be even funnier if Kled himself said lines related to killing Champions near his wards or when his wards are destroyed.

To be fair, many of his killing lines are already things like: "THAT FOR ENTERING MY LANDS!" and such.
this needs to be a skin.

(Kled goes counterjungle, kills enemy jungler)

{{champion:240}} -THIS ARE MY LANDS!

{{champion:64}} -But you are in the wrong jungle...

{{champion:240}} -DON'T INSULT MY JUNGLE! MY JUNGLE IS ALWAYS RIGTH!

Add that when Kled kills an enemy champion he gets a skull ward.

 "You see my welcome sign back there? No? It was your friend's skull!"

> [{quoted}](name=Lazy cat,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=TKjGXQdN,comment-id=0015,timestamp=2017-05-25T02:49:44.545+0000)
>
> Add that when Kled kills an enemy champion he gets a skull ward.
> 
>  "You see my welcome sign back there? No? It was your friend's skull!"

they should put the skull in the enemy's fountain, cause ALL THE LAND IS KLED'S LAND.

This is fantastic. My only concern is that it would be hard to read at the size it would have to be -- might be better to just have something like an arrow reading "Kled's!", since "Property of Kled" would either have to be an enormous ward, or you'd have to REALLY take the time to read it.
Set the ward title as "Property of Kled Ward" (visible in the description when clicked on?) and the actual sign itself just say something like "GET OUT!" over a wood statue of Skarl?
I 100% support this brilliant idea.
I would love that so much. I would get blue ward just so after getting a kill I could place it on their body.
Rito do this plz

Most ideas are completely garbage on the boards.


This is amazing. Holy fuck, this is amazing. Please upvote to try and catch Riot's attention.
I am throwing money at the screen, why is nothing happening?
I love the idea but I don't think wards are big enough to have all those letters on them and actually be readable.
There is no level 8, but I do support the idea.
